column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Deep in the basement is the miniatures section
column2: which admittedly I wasn't too excited about. But
column4: I was absolutely stunned by the quality and attention to detail. I'm pretty sure most people that visit the Art Institute probably don't head down to the minis area
column5: but make sure you do next time. It's like traveling back in time
column7: and getting a taste of what life was like back then. Truly stunning.
